configuration.name: AttributeConverterSpec.***** FileAttribute ***** posix(String) method should convert String 'r--------' to a file attribute of java.util.Set of OWNER_READ ***** FileAttribute ***** posix(String) method should convert String '-w-------' to a file attribute of java.util.Set of OWNER_WRITE ***** FileAttribute ***** posix(String) method should convert String '--x------' to a file attribute of java.util.Set of OWNER_EXECUTE ***** FileAttribute ***** posix(String) method should convert String '---r-----' to a file attribute of java.util.Set of GROUP_READ ***** FileAttribute ***** posix(String) method should convert String '----w----' to a file attribute of java.util.Set of GROUP_WRITE ***** FileAttribute ***** posix(String) method should convert String '-----x---' to a file attribute of java.util.Set of GROUP_EXECUTE ***** FileAttribute ***** posix(String) method should convert String '------r--' to a file attribute of java.util.Set of OTHERS_READ ***** FileAttribute ***** posix(String) method should convert String '-------w-' to a file attribute of java.util.Set of OTHERS_READ ***** FileAttribute ***** posix(String) method should convert String '--------x' to a file attribute of java.util.Set of OTHERS_READ ***** FileAttribute ***** posix(String) method should convert String 'rwx------' to a file attribute of java.util.Set of OWNER_READ, OWNER_WRITE and OWNER_EXECUTE

task.summary: Default task
Convert the project from a groovy library to scala one.
Add pattern operator ==~ and !=~ to String
Define methods of Files as implicit methods of Path
Add implicit conversion methods between FileTime and DateTime in java.time
Add Path extensions related to java stream methods in Files
Add samples of java stream related methods in Files
Add some methods of ScalaJdkPath, Scala version of GDK method extension.
Add line read/write method to Path and Add wrapper class to Input/OutputStream and Reader/Writer.
Change Set to Seq of FileAttributes in method signature in createXxxx() methods.
Add line read/write method to Path and Add wrapper class to Input/OutputStream and Reader/Writer.
Add content to README
Add FileTime conversion tests.
Add POSIX file permission conversion tests.
Add tests of GluinoIO related classes.
Add tests of stream closing in loan patterns.
Add tests for Reader#readLines etc.
Add tests for Reader#eachChar etc.
Add tests for AppendableConverter
Add tests for WriterWrapper.
Add ReaderWrapperLike and InputStreamLike trait.
Add WriterWrapperLike, PrintWriterLike and OutputStreamLike trait.
Add tests for concrete subclasses of ReaderWrapperLike trait
Add tests for concrete subclasses of InputStreamWrapperLike trait
Add method declarations related to ObjectStream/DataStream
Refactor tests of InputStreamWrapper and ReaderWrapper
Add some methods related to data stream and object stream.
Add and refactor many tests.
Add tests of stream closing for data streams and object streams.
Add tests for stream
Add FileType constant and enabling to filter with FileType.
Refactor test fixtures.
Add DirectoryBuilder to build directory structure easily
Add DirectoryBuilder to build directory structure easily
Add impls and tests for file-iteration methods of FileWrapperLike
Fix and Refactor DirectoryBuilder
Implement recursive file visitor methods in FileWrapperLike
Add iteration methods of files and directories to FileWrapper and PathWrapper class
Implement copy methods of FileWrapper and PathWrapper
Add isOlderThan() and isNewerThan() method to FileWrapperLike trait
Implement renameTo() and move() methods of FileWrapperLike trait
Add createTempDirectory() method for java.io.File in GluinoFile
Add tests for moveDir() and copyDir() methods of FileWrapperLike trait
Add acl() method which convert a String to a FileAttribute on AttributeConverter trait
